name: iso-28258
description: ISO 28258:2013 international standard implementation as a PostgreSQL database
author: Luis Calisto <luis.calisto@isric.org>

scripts.make-release: sh -c 'pg_dump iso28258 --inserts --no-owner --no-security-labels --no-table-access-method --no-tablespaces -n core -n metadata | sed -e "/^-- Dumped by pg_dump/d" -e "/^..*restrict/d" -e "/^SET check_function_bodies/!{/^SET /d;}" -e "/^SELECT pg_catalog.set_config/d" > releases/$1' --
